title: Desk Fit

en: You see an offer for a second-hand combo desk and exercise bike combo in your area. It's much cheaper than buying it new, at only $200. Is it worth buying it?

yes_caption: Kill two birds with one stone, right?
no_caption: Try to do two things, do neither.

en: It does admittedly distract you a little bit, but you get lots of energy and a bit of satisfaction too.
You decide not to bother. Looks like a recipe for haemorrhoids anyway.
